query: SELECT p.orderNumber, p.hospitalId, h.customerName, SUM(CAST(pl.quantity AS DECIMAL)) as total_curtains FROM purchases p JOIN hospitals h ON p.hospitalId = h.id LEFT JOIN purchaseLines pl ON pl.purchaseId = p.id WHERE p.orderNumber = 'SO-U-00000839' GROUP BY p.id
